sentences.sContent: We can use genetics to stratify patients in clinical development.
sentences.sContent_eng: We can use genetics to stratify patients in clinical development.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以在临床开发中采用遗传学进行患者分层。

sentences.sContent: What history and physical examination data help to risk - stratify patients with syncope?
sentences.sContent_eng: What history and physical examination data help to risk - stratify patients with syncope?
sentences.sCn: 何种病史和体验资料有助于晕厥患者的危险分层?。

words.tran: 分层的；形成阶层的；分为不同等级的
（组织的）层；[地质] 地层；社会阶层

trans.tranOther: to form or be formed in layers or strata
